desc: Wordbits are modern alphabet magnets, strong enough to actually hold stuff. Our magnetic letters are made from recycled plastic, they each have a strong rare-earth magnet which can hold a greeting card and they are set in our own award-winning typeface.

layout.text: ALPHABET MAGNETS THAT ACTUALLY HOLD STUFF.
The playful nostalgia of traditional letter magnets, now with a serious style and strength upgrade.
